typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 10,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select * from ',
	format: 'query') ~> totalSummery
source(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 10,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> pivotTable
totalSummery filter(ERROR_FUNCTION('')) ~> Filter1
pivotTable filter(ERROR_FUNCTION('')) ~> Filter2
Filter2 unpivot(output(
		productline as string
	),
	lateral: false,
	ignoreNullPivots: false) ~> Unpivon
Filter1, Unpivon join(ERROR_FUNCTION('') == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
